Miele was founded in 1899

their vacuums have become favorites of professionals worldwide ,

The Miele S2 line of canister vacuums is new for 2009 ,

offering the quality and many of Miele 's standard features at a lower price .
There are four S2 models ,

all sharing the same 1200-watt base vacuum .
The canister has six power settings and a standard air filter

that catches 94 % of particles down to 0 . 3 microns .
